metadata.title: Crunch Time Custom Football Jersey Fully Customized with Names & Numbers
features: Machine Wash Low with Similar Colors

YOUTH JERSEY CHEST SIZES: Youth X-Small/M - 32 | Youth Small-Med - 37 | Youth Large-XL - 43 | Youth 2X-Large - 46 | ADULT JERSEY CHEST SIZES: Adult Small-Med - 48 | Adult Large-XL - 52 | XX-Large - 56 | Adult 3X-Large - 60 | Adult 4X-Large - 64 | Sizing shown in inches as a measurement around the chest.| Roll over Sizing Chart Image to Zoom in and for Sizing Details.
Choose your Jersey Color and Size then Click the Customize now Button and enter your customization options. Customize all, part or enter the word BLANK for no printing.
Includes your choice of names and numbers on front and back as shown in the examples. Enter up to 30 characters for names and 2 digits for numbers. The numbers designed to match regulation sizing.

Choose from 18 Lettering Colors, white, black, royal blue , navy blue, scarlet red, athletic gold, dark green, kelly green, shark teal, orange, maroon, purple, pink, grey, columbia blue, Vegas Gold, old missouri gold and texas orange. Printed with industry leading heatset ThermoFilm vinyl that is tough, durable and lightweight, yet super opaque and will last the life of the garment.

This pro-style game jersey is a great fitting jersey with a solid look and feel. The tricot mesh holds up to the rigors of the game, the extra long length and u-notch stays tucked in and makes for a comfortable fit. The lycra side panels keep the jersey snug and the extra room in the shoulders allows for padding.
description: The main body of this jersey is constructed of heavyweight Tricot mesh that allows excellent stretch to strenght ratio. The spanex side panels give just the right amount of stretch to keep the jersey snug but not tight. The lycra cuffs provide greater flexibility and will not become brittle and snap like elastic cuffs. Finally the medium weight dazzle shoulders and yoke provide complete the jersey with a soft feel but tough-as-nails double reinforced 2-ply construction. You can personalize this jersey with your team name, player name and player number.
